description:
Livehopper is a technology company focusing on lean technologies for highly efficient and environment-friendly products. We strive to be valued by our clients, employees, business partners, investors and the community at large. A venture founded by Ecole Polytechnique and IIT alumni. The team includes alumni from top institutions Ecole polytechnique, France and IIT Kanpur, India. We have a team of highly driven individuals determined to build green technologies.
Each member brings deep business acumen and outsourcing domain expertise, which enables us to drive outperformance in our clients' businesses.
